column3:
樹海スグラントで カッシーワが詠っていた古の詩

『深淵の森 大蛇 喰らうべく開かれし 龍のアギト
 そこに勇者の試練が眠る』

この詩が意味することとは…
column4:
The ancient song that Kass sang at
Pagos Woods is hinting at something...

\"Where the forestdragon splays its jaws,
A shrine sleeps with noble cause.\"

Your task is to decipher its riddle.

column3:
『この勇気の泉に
黄金の精霊 フロドラのウロコを捧げなさい』

女神様の言葉に従い勇気の泉に
フロドラのウロコを浮かべると
古代の祠が現れた
column4:
\"OfferFarosh's scale received from the
golden spirit to the Spring of Courage.\"

Just as the Goddess instructed, you threw
Farosh's scale into the Spring of Courage.
A shrine appeared as a result!

column3:
樹海スグラントで カッシーワが詠っていた古の詩
この詩の意味を読み解いて勇気の泉を見つけ
そこで女神様の声を聞いた

『この勇気の泉に
黄金の精霊フロドラのウロコを捧げなさい』

フロドラのウロコ とは一体…？
column4:
Kass recited the lyrics to an ancient song when
you met him in Pagos Woods. You figured out
the hidden meaning of the song and
discovered the Spring of Courage as a result.
It was at that moment that the voice of the
Goddess spoke to you.

\"OfferFarosh's scale received from the
golden spirit to the Spring of Courage.\"

What's aFarosh's scale?
